record.title: EXTENSION OF MORNING BUSINESS
record.narrative:
EXTENSION OF MORNING BUSINESS -- (Senate - October 16, 2007)

[Page: S12888]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the time for morning business be extended by 5 minutes for each side.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent to be recognized for 5 minutes, and that following my presentation, Senator Chambliss from Georgia have the remaining 5 minutes.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
